naslov: Pag - kuća s dva apartmana blizu mora (prodaja)
opis: Pag - u gradu Pagu prodajemo dvojnu kuću s dva apartmana, garažom i vrtom. Kuća je smještena nasuprot starog grada, u novom naselju koje ima vodu i kanalizaciju. Sagrađena je 2005.g. S velike terase i balkona pruža se prekrasan pogled na more i specifičnu pašku vegetaciju i kamenjar. U suterenu je garaža, na prvom katu dvosoban stan s dnevnim boravkom i kupaonicom veličine 80 m2, te na drugom katu identičan stan. Kuća je odlična investicija - kako za život, tako i za turističke apartmane. Za razgledavanje i informacije obratite se osobno agentu. Pag - in the town of Pag we are selling a double house with two apartments, a garage and a garden. The house is located opposite of the old town, in a new settlement that has water and sewage. It was built in 2005. From the large terrace and balcony there is a beautiful view of the sea and specific vegetation of Pag and rocks. In the basement there is a garage, on the first floor a two-bedroom apartment with a living room and a bathroom of 80 m2, and on the second floor is the identical apartment. The house is a great investment - both for living and for tourism. For sightseeing and information contact the agent!
